Usage
=====

To start the backend:

    .. code-block:: bash

        // enter agronova_backend directory
        cd agronova_backend && npm start

        // open them locally
        http://localhost:3000
        


To start the frontend:

    .. code-block:: bash

        // enter FRONT directory
        cd FRONT && npm install; npm run serve

        // open them locally
        http://localhost:8080
